templates.template:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE beans PUBLIC "-//SPRING//DTD BEAN//EN" "http://www.springframework.org/dtd/spring-beans.dtd">
<beans> <!-- ************************** DAO SETTING *********************************--> <!-- DAO object: Hibernate implementation --> <bean id="" class=""> <property name="baseDAO"> <ref bean="baseDAO"/> </property> </bean>
<!-- ************************** SERVICE SETTING *****************************--> <!-- ***** security SERVICE *****--> <bean id="" class="org.springframework.transaction.interceptor.TransactionProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="transactionManager"> <ref bean="transactionManager"/> </property> <property name="target"> <bean class=""> <property name=""> <ref bean=""/> </property> </bean> </property> <property name="transactionAttributes"> <props> <prop key="remove*">PROPAGATION_REQUIRED</prop> <prop key="find*">PROPAGATION_REQUIRED,readOnly</prop> <prop key="save*">PROPAGATION_REQUIRED</prop> <prop key="delete*">PROPAGATION_REQUIRED</prop> <prop key="*">PROPAGATION_REQUIRED,readOnly</prop> </props> </property> </bean>
<bean id="" class=""> <property name="baseDAO"> <ref bean="baseDAO"/> </property> </bean> </beans>
